topics.body: Okay so, due to a contract dispute between my satellite TV provider and Turner Broadcasting, I'm probably gonna miss Toonami this Saturday. So, does anyone know of a site where I could watch Hellsing Ultimate online without having my computer get infected with every internet STD in existence?
